name: Legend of Floss
description:
My submission for Ludum Dare 47 - Theme: Stuck in a loop.

In a world taken by corporations, corrupt politicians and bureaucrats, it is up to this one Millenial to do what no one else would dare to...

In order to save humanity from itself, he gotta perform the legendary Floss Dancing - The ultimate Dance Move that, according to the legend would unite the entire world into a single purpose...

To be flossing!
